New Records: Zach Neto is the first Angels infielder with a 20-homer, 20-steal season.
Key Match Events: Zach Neto homered during the fifth inning.
Rookie Jack Kochanowicz pitched six scoreless innings.
Ben Joyce got the final four outs for his third save.
Mickey Moniak’s double in the fourth inning.
Detroit had runners on the corners with one out in the sixth, but Kochanowicz got Jace Jung to hit into a 4-6-3 double play.
Joey Wentz was hit by two hard comebackers in the seventh inning.
Roansy Contreras got Dillon Dingler to ground into a force at second in the seventh inning.
José Quijada loaded the bases in the eighth, but Ben Joyce struck out Spencer Torkelson.
Post-Match Reflections: Zach Neto expressed his joy about achieving a 20-homer, 20-steal season.
Angels manager Ron Washington praised Jack Kochanowicz for his performance.
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch reflected on missed opportunities.
